p: Data from pharmacological evaluations are presented as the mean ± standard error of the mean (S.E.M.) of each treatment. Statistical analysis was carried out using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Dunnett’s post hoc test to compare treatments against the vehicle group. Data from the temporal course curve of writhing test were analysed by two-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc test. The analysis was done using GraphPad version 6 program (GraphPad Software, La Jolla, CA). A value of p < 0.05 was considered significant.
